metadata.title: CVE-2018-10472 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers (in certain configurations) to read arbitrary dom0 files via QMP liveinsertion of a CDROM, in conjunction with specifying the target file as thebacking file of a snapshot.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10472` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.9 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
libxenstore3.0 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.6-amd64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.6-arm64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.6-armhf - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.7-amd64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.7-arm64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.7-armhf - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.8-amd64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6

xen-hypervisor-4.8-armhf - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-hypervisor-4.9-amd64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6

xen-hypervisor-4.9-armhf - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-system-amd64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-system-arm64 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-system-armhf - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
xen-utils-4.9 - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6

xenstore-utils - 4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xen package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.3+xsa262+shim4.10.0+comet3-1+deb9u6').
